brief: public abstract void basicDisplayBox(Point origin, Point corner);
sourceCode: public abstract void basicDisplayBox(Point origin, Point corner);
full_method_info:
/**
 * Sets the display box of a figure. This is the
 * method that subclassers override. Clients usually
 * call displayBox.
 * @see #displayBox
 */
public abstract void basicDisplayBox(Point origin, Point corner);
method_comment:

     * method that subclassers override. Clients usually
     * call displayBox.
